title: FS2004: Aerosoft Mega Airport Stockholm Arlanda
description:
Well I keep looking... But no one has uploaded this one!! WHY!!?? So I am not gonna complain. I bought it, like it,and I am happy to share. I am a leecher and have been since I discovered TBP back in January. Downloaded thouands worth of crap! So I am finally giving back to the community. This is my first upload so if there any issues, please let me know so I can fix them. This product uses the Wildmans crack. I assume you all know how to use it. Enjoy!

Psysive (sy-sive)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Psysive Presents: FS2004: Aerosoft Mega Airport Stockholm Arlanda, the hub of the capital of Sweden, now for Microsoft Flight 2004. Developed by the Design-Team "DreamFactorystudio" this scenery represents an absolute realistic recreation of the complete Swedish real airport. 

Stockholm Arlanda is the third biggest airport in Scandinavia. As it covers a rather large area there is very much to see while taxiing to or from one of the 64 gates. The parallel runways (01L/01R) are a guarantee to see AI traffic close to your own aircraft, something we always appreciate when we depart or arrive. 

The airport has been totally rebuilt with photo realistic ground textures and enhanced textures. Almost every building has been included in the new version. Developed by the Design-Team "DreamFactorystudio" this scenery represents an absolute realistic recreation of the complete Swedish real airport. A FSX version will be available soon and without any additional costs for customers of this version. 

Features:

All important buildings created with the aid of real photographs of the airport
Dynamic and animated objects
High resolution day- and night textures
High resolution areal photo texture
Seasonal textures
Docking systems
Corrected landclass files
Taxiways, apron with realistic rendered textures
Complete apron markings
AI compatible
For FS2004 and later FSX
Customers purchasing the FS2004 version will again receive a free FSX version when its available. Please note screenshots are made using MyTraffic 2006. 



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Additional specifications: 
Download-Version (FS2004): Version 1.00, Manual (German, English) as a .pdf-file 

Download free Charts at http://www.lfv.se 



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

System requirements:
Microsoft Flight Simulator 2004
Windows XP/Vista
Pentium 2.0 Ghz
1 GB RAM
Graphic card with 256 MB
Download-Size: 138 MB
Installations-Size: 418 MB
